subject: Football
Race and Ethnicity
United States Defense and Military Forces
Segregation and Desegregation
lead_paragraph: Beach and his friend and teammate Jim Brown were part of a star-studded group that attended a 1967 gathering that backed Muhammad Ali’s refusal to be inducted into the United States Army.
snippet: Beach and his friend and teammate Jim Brown were part of a star-studded group that attended a 1967 gathering that backed Muhammad Ali’s refusal to be inducted into the United States Army.
